unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Conditions for Geometric Distribution
question_text: Which of the following conditions is NOT among those required for the geometric distribution?

choices.text: Each trial has the same probability of success.
Each trial has only two outcomes.
A fixed number of trials exists.
Each trial is independent of the previous one.
The variable of interest is the number of trials necessary until the first success.
